title: Need a bronze or silver to team up with me bot
body:
Hi guys,
I'm after a bronze or silver player who has a positive attitude, and willing to improve on his/her skills.
Prefer someone who is keen to go adc or support, so I can either support you, or you can support me.

Bot lane is always the one that feeds the hardest in bronze, so I'm really wanting to team up with someone who can help cancel out those odds, and make carrying a a lot easier.

replies.body: I sent you a friend request. Jump on and accept and we'll talk about it  :)
